QuestData.Title: Hir'eek, the Bat Loa
QuestData.Description:
Hir'eek knows we are here. If my knowledge of Hir'eek is correct, he will personally kill us after we present ourselves.
It is time, den. You and I will walk out dere into a horde of blood trolls who want to watch their loa kill us.
Take dis dagger. It is coated with de poison I made. I trust you to survive longer than me to use it.
You pretend to cower to Hir'eek, and I will do de talking. On my signal, you jump on Hir'eek and start stabbing!
...And den we hope for de best.
QuestData.PortraitGiverName: Hir'eek, Lord of the Midnight Sky
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The loa of bats now serves the Blood God, G'huun.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Jo'chunga within the blood ritual pool
